summary.span: 在 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 內容中裝載 Win32 視窗作為項目。

span.span: Hosts a Win32 window as an element within Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主機[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]視窗中，建立衍生自類別。To host a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] window, create a class that derives from . 覆寫方法，並建立您[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]做為傳遞至方法的父視窗的子視窗。Override the method and create your [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] window as a child of the parent window that is passed into the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 雖然衍生自的各種屬性來自和其他中繼類別，例如通常不會對應至可能[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)]對等項目。Although derives from , various properties of that come from and other intermediate classes such as are not generally mapped to possible [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] equivalents. 另外，並非所有 / 輸入事件傳輸跨互通界限。Also, not all / input events transfer across the interoperation boundary. 衍生自主要是使執行個體可以插入各種可能的內容模型，因此，預設和可以套用配置的特性。 derives from primarily so that an instance can be inserted into the widest variety of possible content models, and so that default layout characteristics can apply. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [WPF 和 Win32 交互操作](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-and-win32-interoperation.md)。For more details on , see [WPF and Win32 Interoperation](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-and-win32-interoperation.md).

span.span: The handle to the child [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] window to create.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的實作中呼叫的內部實作。This method's implementation is called from within the internal implementation of . 只有當呼叫的執行緒所擁有的視窗時，才會建立子視窗。The child window will be created only if the window is owned by the calling thread.

para.span: 覆寫這個方法，以建立要裝載的視窗。

span.span: Override this method to build the window being hosted.

para.span: 您所傳回的視窗必須是所指定視窗的子系。

span.span: The window that you return must be a child of the window specified by .

para.span: 此外，如果呼叫的執行緒所擁有的視窗，將只建立子視窗。

span.span: In addition, the child window will only be created if the window is owned by the calling thread.

summary.span: 立即釋放物件可能佔用的任何系統資源。

span.span: Immediately frees any system resources that the object might hold.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個類型或成員不可以使用網際網路安全性區域中。This type or member is not available in the Internet security zone. 在衍生的類別可以覆寫這個方法，如果他們需要執行其他清除工作。Derived classes can override this method if they need to do additional cleanup. 不過，它們也應該呼叫基底實作，以確保所有資源都已都釋放。However, they should also call the base implementation to ensure that all resources are freed. 基底實作會相當多的工作，以釋出已知的基底類別的資源。The base implementation does fairly substantial work to free resources that are known to the base class. 如果正在主控視窗，也會在終結。If a window is being hosted, it will be destroyed. 呼叫的執行緒必須發送器相同。The calling thread must be the same as the dispatcher.

span.span: Returns the size of the window represented by the object, as requested by layout engine operations.
The size of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個類型或成員不可以使用網際網路安全性區域中。This type or member is not available in the Internet security zone.

permission.span: 若要調整版面配置 (由配置引擎採取所裝載的區域)。

span.span: in order to adjust the layout (by having the layout engine act upon the hosted region).
Associated enumeration:

para.span: 在 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)]，視窗應該是在建立時的視窗配置所要求的大小。

span.span: In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)], a window is expected to be the size requested by layout at the time the window is created.

para.span: 在衍生的類別應該覆寫這個方法，只有當他們有必要的視窗大小有關的其他資訊。

span.span: Derived classes should override this method only if they have additional information regarding required window size.

para.span: 特定的實作已覆寫基礎視窗控制代碼上的大小限制，並在一或多個維度中的零值視為非條件約束的虛擬成員。

span.span: The specific implementation here is already an override of the virtual member, which bases size constraints on the window handle and treats a zero value in one or more dimensions as a non-constraint.

para.span: 類別也會覆寫太大時，會導致在表單的剪輯的實作。

span.span: The class also overrides a implementation that will result in a clip of the form if it is too large.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個類型或成員不可以使用網際網路安全性區域中。This type or member is not available in the Internet security zone. > > 這會覆寫類別處理常式，並提供的轉譯行為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)]訊息到[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]事件，將事件標示為已處理在情況允許時。This is an override of the class handler and provides the behavior of translating the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] message into a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] event, marking the event as handled whenever appropriate.

summary.span: 更新子視窗的大小、可視性和位置，以反映項目的目前狀態。
